TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RC2 extends System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class RC2 Inherits SymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: 表示 算法的所有实现都必须从中派生的基类。

span.span: Represents the base class from which all implementations of the algorithm must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 较新的对称加密算法，高级加密标准 (AES)，是可用的。A newer symmetric encryption algorithm, Advanced Encryption Standard (AES), is available. 请考虑使用算法和而不是其派生的类类。Consider using the algorithm and its derived classes instead of the class. 使用仅为与旧的应用程序和数据的兼容性。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法创建抽象类的实例。You cannot create an instance of an abstract class. 应用程序代码将创建派生类的新实例。Application code will create a new instance of a derived class. 此算法支持密钥长度为 40 位至 1024 位以增量为 8 位，但实现仅支持增量为 8 位的密钥长度为 40 位至 128 位。This algorithm supports key lengths from 40 bits to 1024 bits in increments of 8 bits, but the implementation only supports key lengths from 40 bits to 128 bits in increments of 8 bits. 此方法初始化的受保护的字段下表中列出的默认值。This method initializes the protected fields of to the default values listed in the following table. |字段Field|默认值Default Value| |-----------|-------------------| ||128128| ||6464| ||6464|

summary.span: 创建加密对象的实例以执行 算法。

span.span: Creates an instance of a cryptographic object to perform the algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.RC2 Create() cil managed
Public Shared Function Create () As RC2

summary.span: 创建加密对象的实例以执行 算法。

span.span: Creates an instance of a cryptographic object to perform the algorithm.
An instance of a cryptographic object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来创建可用于加密和解密数据 RC2 类的实例。Use this method to create an instance of the RC2 class that you can use to encrypt and decrypt data. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和使用 RC2 对象进行加密和解密文件中的数据。The following example shows how to create and use an RC2 object to encrypt and decrypt data in a file. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RC2.Create.File#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Create.File/CPP/fileexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RC2.Create.File#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Create.File/CS/fileexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RC2.Create.File#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Create.File/VB/fileexample.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建和使用 RC2 对象在内存中的数据进行加密和解密。The following example shows how to create and use an RC2 object to encrypt and decrypt data in memory. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RC2.Create.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Create.Memory/CPP/memoryexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RC2.Create.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Create.Memory/CS/memoryexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RC2.Create.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Create.Memory/VB/memoryexample.vb#1)]

exception.span: 使用算法时启用了美国联邦信息处理标准 (FIPS) 模式，但该算法与 FIPS 不兼容。

span.span: The algorithm was used with Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) mode enabled, but is not FIPS compatible.

Public Shared Function Create (AlgName As String) As RC2

param.name: AlgName
param.span: 要使用的 的特定实现的名称。

span.span: The name of the specific implementation of to use.

summary.span: 创建加密对象的实例以执行 算法的指定实现。

span.span: Creates an instance of a cryptographic object to perform the specified implementation of the algorithm.
An instance of a cryptographic object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来创建可用于加密和解密数据 RC2 类的实例。Use this method to create an instance of the RC2 class that you can use to encrypt and decrypt data. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和使用 RC2 对象进行加密和解密文件中的数据。The following example shows how to create and use an RC2 object to encrypt and decrypt data in a file. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.File#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.File/CPP/fileexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.File#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.File/CS/fileexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.File#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.File/VB/fileexample.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建和使用 RC2 对象在内存中的数据进行加密和解密。The following example shows how to create and use an RC2 object to encrypt and decrypt data in memory. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.Memory/CPP/memoryexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.Memory/CS/memoryexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2.Createstring.Memory/VB/memoryexample.vb#1)]

exception.span: 由 参数描述的算法在使用中已启用联邦信息处理标准 (FIPS) 模式，但与 FIPS 不兼容。

span.span: The algorithm described by the parameter was used with Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) mode enabled, but is not FIPS compatible.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int EffectiveKeySize { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property EffectiveKeySize As Integer
public: virtual property int EffectiveKeySize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 算法所用密钥的有效大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the effective size of the secret key used by the algorithm in bits.

value.span: 算法所使用的有效密钥大小。

span.span: The effective key size used by the algorithm.
The effective key size is invalid.

summary.span: 表示 算法使用的机密密钥的有效大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Represents the effective size of the secret key used by the algorithm in bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过访问此字段属性。This field is accessed through the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int KeySize { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property KeySize As Integer
public: virtual property int KeySize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 算法使用的机密密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the secret key used by the algorithm in bits.

value.span: 算法使用的机密密钥的大小。

span.span: The size of the secret key used by the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此算法支持密钥长度为 40 位至 1024 位以增量为 8 位，但 RC2CryptoServiceProvider 实现仅支持增量为 8 位的密钥长度为 40 位至 128 位。This algorithm supports key lengths from 40 bits to 1024 bits in increments of 8 bits, but the RC2CryptoServiceProvider implementation only supports key lengths from 40 bits to 128 bits in increments of 8 bits.

exception.span: RC2 密钥大小的值小于有效密钥大小值。

span.span: The value for the RC2 key size is less than the effective key size value.
